location.definition: Describe the location URI of the file.

format.definition: Describes the format of the information object.

Goal.definition: Goals or subgoals describe the objetives to be achieved within the renovation process. For instance: "Stay within estimated budget"

relatedSubGoal.definition: Relationship used to decompose a project goal into more specific sub-goals.

relatedKPIValue.definition: Relates an entity with specific kpi values.

name.definition: name or title of the goal

UnitOfMeasure.definition: The unit of measure is a standard for measurement of a quantity, such as a Property. For example, Power is a property and Watt is a unit of power that represents a definite predetermined power: when we say 10 Watt, we actually mean 10 times the definite predetermined power called "watt". Our definition is based on the definition of unit of measure in the Ontology of units of Measure (OM). We propose here a list of some units of measure that are relevant for the purpose of the Smart Appliances ontology, but this list can be extended.

Building.definition: The building element comprises all elements that are primarily part of the construction of a building, i.e., its structural and space separating system. Building elements are all physically existent and tangible things.

ifcIdentifier.definition: Global ID used in the IFC file.

Kpi.definition: Key performance indicators related to building renovation projects

relatedKPIValue.definition: Relates an entity with specific kpi values.

CalculationPeriod.definition: Indicates the calculation period of a KPI.

Scenario.definition: The simluation of a building renovation work.

relatedProject.definition: Relates an entity with a project.

relatedKPI.definition: relates an entity with specific kpi definitions.

relatedMeasure.definition: Relates an scenario with the renovation measures to be taken.

MaterialLayer.definition: A single and identifiable part of an element which is constructed of a number of layers (one or more).

position.definition: Position of the layer within the set of layers that compose a building element.

relatedMaterialLayerCost.definition: Related cost to the material layer.

unitOfMeasure.definition: Relates an entity with a unit of measure.

Element.definition: An element is a generalization of all components that make up an AEC product.

ifcIdentifier.definition: Global ID used in the IFC file.

area.definition: Affected area of the building element due to a renovation measure.

TemporalDuration.definition: Time extent; duration of a time interval separate from its particular start position.

KPIValue.definition: Key performance indicator values calculated for a specific renovation project and scenario.

maxValue.definition: Upper limit to define a KPI Value.

relatedParameter.definition: Links a KPI value with the parameters used for its calculation.

tolerance.definition: Tolerance error in the value of a KPI.

relatedProject.definition: Relates an entity with a project.

minValue.definition: Lower limit to define a KPI Value.

relatedScenario.definition: Relates an entity with a renovation scenario.

Value.definition: Numeric quantity of a KPI value.

unitOfMeasure.definition: Relates an entity with a unit of measure.

quantifiesKPI.definition: A KPI value quantifies a specific KPI.

refersToTime.definition: Property to add a time stamp to a KPI value.

LayerCost.definition: Costs associated to the material layers such as installation, disposal, or maintenance costs.

RenovationMeasure.definition: Renovation action to be applied on the project. For example: Renovation of external facade insulation.

relatedElement.definition: Indicates what are the building elements affected by the renovation measure.

unitOfMeasure.definition: Relates an entity with a unit of measure.

relatedKPI.definition: relates an entity with specific kpi definitions.

relatedLayer.definition: Indicates what are the layers of a specific building element affected by the renovation measure.

PerformanceParameter.definition: Represent the parameters or variables that are used to measure the performance of an specific task, and are useful to compute project KPI's.

unitOfMeasure.definition: Relates an entity with a unit of measure.

Value.definition: Numeric quantity of a KPI value.

Project.definition: A project is a temporary endeavor undertaken to achieve defined objectives (definition taken from DBpedia).

relatedBuilding.definition: Links to the building the project is about.

relatedDocumentation.definition: Links the project with its respective documentation.

updateDate.definition: The most recent editing date of a project.

relatedScenario.definition: Relates an entity with a renovation scenario.

countryCode.definition: The ISO country code where the project is being developed.

creationDate.definition: The date when the project was created.

relatedGoal.definition: Link to link a project with a set of goals.
